name: WillHost.It
title: Solo Developer
shortDes: a file hosting site for anyone on the internet to use
section1:
WillHost.It was a free file hosting website - designed at a time where it was challenging to find good ways to host .exe files, I ran this project for about a year. As this was while I was in highschool, I didn't have any funding to keep up with changing technologies of the time and this project moved to the backburner.

Still, the site was heavily utilized - it averaged at 5,000 file uploads per day and was shared on the front page of Reddit several times.

Sadly, while it's rather easy to make a site like this today, I no longer have the WillHost.It source code and archive.org does not have the most up-to-date versions - hence why there are two identical screenshots on this page!
